description: A personal portfolio and service platform for Shakibul Islam Prohor, offering web development, app development, and various digital tools. The site includes robust client communication and project management features.
services: UI/UX Design from concept to implementation

support_page.description: The support page provides a structured way for users and guests to submit inquiries. It is designed to handle various types of requests efficiently.
capabilities: Submit account and login problem reports.
Ask general questions through an 'Others' category.
support_page.process_flow: When a ticket is submitted, it is added to the admin's Support Center queue for review. Status is tracked as 'open' or 'closed'. Communication is handled based on the contact information provided in the ticket.
